title: BIQU Upgrade SSS Spring Steel Sheet with Magnetic Sticker, 235X235MM Ultra-Flexible Removable Surface Heated Bed Platform 3D Printer Parts Printing Build Plate for Ender 3/Ender3 Pro/Ender 5/B1
features: ❤【APPLICABLE PRINTER MODEL】The size of the spring steel sheet is 235x235mm, which is suitable for any 3D printer with a printing platform size of 235*235mm. Such as Ender 3/Ender 3X /Ender 3 Pro/Ender 3 Prox/Ender 5 /Ender 5 Pro /BIQU B1 etc.

❤【APPLICABLE FILAMENTS TYPES】The Heated Bed Platform can print a variety of filaments, such as PLA, PETG, TPU, ABS, etc. The high-temperature-resistant spring steel plate can withstand temperatures above 200°.
❤【EASY TO USE AND FLEXIBLE】The SSS Heated bed Surface has certain flexibility and can be bent. After cooling, the model is loose and easy to take.

❤【STRONG ADHESION】After the hot bed is heated, the model is stable on the hot bed,and not easy to loose and fall off. The surface of the build plate is wear-resistant, and the coating is not easy to wear.

❤【12 MONTHS LONGER WARRANTY】Package include: 1X SSS Spring Steel Sheet. 1X Magnetic sticker. Strict testing for all components before delivery.Thank you very much for your choice and trust. If you have any questions about the product, can you contact us first? Give us the opportunity to understand your needs, and we will do our best to answer questions and solve problems for you.
description: BIQU Upgrade SSS Super Spring Steel Sheet
High quality, Strong adhesion, High temperature resistance and Wear resistance biqu mat.
【Recommended hot bed temperature when printing filaments】
PLA: 45 ℃ Celsius to 55 ℃ Celsius.  PETG: 60 ℃ Celsius to 80 ℃ Celsius.  (the larger the printed model, the higher the hot bed temperature)

Size : 235X235X0.3mm Material: Special steel Process: Stamping Surface treatment: special powder high precision industrial oil Hardness: 550-600 degrees Withstand temperature: 200 ℃ Printing filament : PLA / ABS / TPU / PETG
Cooperate with soft magnetic stickers to adsorbed on hot bed. Cooperate with magnet to adsorbed on hot bed. Fixed on hot bed with dovetail clamp.

(1)Don't scratch the surface to avoid deformation of the bottom surface of the printing model. (2) Don't bend the steel plate excessively to avoid damaging the surface coating. (3) Please confirm whether the magnetic force is enough to ensure that the steel plate is stable on the platform before printing with soft magnetic paste and magnet. (4) Please clean the surface of the steel plate before the first time printing to avoid surface stains from interfering with printing. (5) Don't use chemicals other than alcohol to clean. (6) Please level before printing to avoid nozzle scratching the surface.

1X SSS Spring Steel Sheet.  1X Magnetic sticker.If there is a problem with missing parts of the product, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with a solution for reissue or refund, thank you
